old:
雑談は苦手でな
――悪いな
column2: I'm not good at chit chat. -- sorry.
speaker: Quintus

old:
言わなかったかな――
わたしは楽しい雑談相手ではない
column2: Did I not say it? - I'm not a fun person to chat with.
speaker: Quintus

old: 人からは見下されるくらいが丁度良い――
column2: Being looked down upon by others is just about right.
speaker: Quintus

old:
わたしなりの哲学だが、理解者は少ない
おまえはどうだ？
column2: My own philosophy, but few people understand it. What about you?
speaker: Quintus

old:
わたしの両親は性格が昼と夜――空と海ほどに
性格が違う人たちだった
column2: My parents were people whose personalities were as different as night and day— as different as the sky and the sea.
speaker: Quintus

old:
わたしは母とうまが合ったが
はて昼だろうか夜だろうかと時々思うのだ
column2: I get along with my mother but sometimes I wonder if we're just day and night.
speaker: Quintus

old:
苦難が我々を結びつけたことは否定しない
苦難が我々を強くしたことも否定はできない
column2: I do not deny that suffering has brought us together. I cannot deny that suffering has made us stronger.
speaker: Quintus

old:
しかし――この状況に意味があるとすれば
それくらいだと思わないか？
column2: However, if there is any meaning to this situation, wouldn't it be something like that?
speaker: Quintus

old: ああ、用件を聞こうか
column2: Let's hear what you have to say.
speaker: Quintus

old:
用がすんだら国へ帰れ
今の我々には監視すら負担になる
column2: When you finish your task, you can go back to your country. It's too much work for us now to even keep an eye on you.
speaker: Quintus

old:
風が吹いてきた――
これは追い風だ――ああ、感じるぞ
column2: The words of Master White Dragon—I cannot let even a single word pass me by.
speaker: Quintus

old:
将軍が戻ってから流れが変わったな
そういう人なんだよ、あの人は
column2: The flow has changed since the general returned. That's the kind of person he is.
speaker: Quintus

old:
ジリアンはうまく立ち回っているだろうか
交渉上手というわけではないからな――
column2:
I wonder if Gillian is standing up to it well.
She's not exactly a great negotiator.
speaker: Quintus

old:
王子が盗賊の世話になるとはね
将軍も心中穏やかではないだろうな
column2:
I can't believe the prince is in the care of bandits.
I'm sure the general is not at peace with that.
speaker: Quintus

old:
盗賊たちの受け入れ準備をした方が
よいのだろうか――
column2: Should we prepare to receive the bandits?
speaker: Quintus

old: どうだ？　少しは陣が明るくなったか？
column2: Well? Has the situation in the camp improved a bit?
speaker: Quintus

old:
ネド王子は、自分の身は自分で守ると
頑なだがそうはいかない
column2:
Prince Nedo said he would protect himself.
He's stubborn, but it doesn't work that way.
speaker: Quintus

old: あんたたちも力を貸してくれ
column2: Please lend me your strength as well
speaker: Quintus

old:
このティネスの守りを固めるべきか
それとも強固な砦を求めて
遠征すべきか――
column2: Should we fortify the defenses of Fort Thines, or should we go on an expedition searching for a stronger fortress-?
speaker: Quintus

old: ふむ、将軍と相談してみようか
column2: Hmm, let's consult with the general.
speaker: Quintus

old: しばらく兵の増強は難しいだろう
column2: It will be difficult to reinforce the troops for a while.
speaker: Quintus

old:
となれば、今いる兵たちの配備を
工夫して難局を乗り切らなければな
column2: Then, we'll have to get through the harsh situation by devising a way to deploy the troops we have now.
speaker: Quintus

old: １人、３人と兵が増えていく
column2: The number of soldiers is increasing, one by one, and three by three.
speaker: Quintus

old:
日々、少しずつではあるがネド王子を慕って
民たちが集まってくるんだ
column2: Every day, little by little, the people gather around Prince Nedo.
speaker: Quintus

old:
イェルハルドがいるから抜かりはないと
思うが陽動部隊の連中はちゃんと食事を
とっているだろうか
column2: I'm sure Gerhard is there to make sure that everything is taken care of, but I wonder if those guys in the diversionary unit are getting a proper meal.
speaker: Quintus

old:
イェルハルドがいるから抜かりはないと
思うが陽動部隊の連中はちゃんと食事を
とっているだろうか
column2: I'm sure Gerhard is there to make sure that everything is taken care of, but I wonder if those guys in the diversionary unit are getting a proper meal.
speaker: Quintus

old:
展望城は王家だけではなく
我々解放軍の面々にとっても思い入れのある
場所だ
column2: The Lookout Castle is not only a place that is dear to the royal family, but also to all of us in the Liberation Army.
speaker: Quintus

old: わたしは参加できないが――頼むぞ
column2: I can't participate, but I'm counting on you.
speaker: Quintus

old:
わたしも城へ行きたいが
砦の差配も重要な任務だからな
column2:
I'd like to go to the castle, too, but
it's an important mission to man the fort.
speaker: Quintus

old:
王都メガドの奪回は簡単ではないだろう
でも、今の解放軍ならやれる気がする
column2: It won't be easy to reclaim the Royal Capital of Megado, but I feel like the Liberation Army can do it now.
speaker: Quintus

old:
そっちの様子はどうだい？
ここの留守はまかせてくれよ
column2:
How's it going over there?
I'll take care of things here myself.
speaker: Quintus

old:
最前線へ飛んで行きたいが
砦を空にするわけにはいかないのだ
王子と解放軍を頼んだぞ
column2:
I'd love to rush to the front lines, but we can't leave the fort empty.
Take care of the prince and the liberation army.
speaker: Quintus

old: 第一次王都奪回作戦は失敗したと聞く
column2: I heard that the first attempt to retake the Royal Capital has failed.
speaker: Quintus

old:
次の作戦には参加したいが持ち場を
離れるわけにはいかないからな
column2: I want to participate in the next mission, but I can't leave my post.
speaker: Quintus

old: 顔を見に来てくれたのか？
column2: Did you come to see me?
speaker: Quintus

old:
うれしいね
みんなにも声をかけてやってくれ
column2: That's great. Please speak to everyone and let them know.
speaker: Quintus

old:
今はメガド奪回作戦の重要な局面のはず
さあ早く戻ってくれ
column2: Now is an important moment in the plan to regain Megado. Please come back quickly.
speaker: Quintus

old:
展望城に移らなくても良いのだろうか
わたしが必要ではないのだろうか
column2: Is it okay not to move to Lookout Castle? Am I not needed?
speaker: Quintus

old:
わたしの知る限り、ここには
ネド王子は来ていない
column2: As far as I know, Prince Nedo is not here.
speaker: Quintus

old: ここだけの話――
column2: Just between you and me...
speaker: Quintus

old:
周囲のおとなたちがネド王子を
甘やかしすぎたということはないだろうか
いや、ここだけの話だ
column2:
Could it be that the adults around have spoiled Prince Nedo too much?
No, this is just between us.
speaker: Quintus

old:
いろいろな噂が聞こえてくるが
なに、心配はしていないさ
column2: I hear a lot of rumors, but I'm not worried.
speaker: Quintus

old: 皆、やる時はやる人たちだからな
column2: Everyone, because they are the people who do it when they need to, right.
speaker: Quintus

old:
君たちと出会った頃、わたしたちの心は
暗い海のようだったが――今はどうだ
column2: When we met you, our hearts were like dark seas--but now?
speaker: Quintus

old:
たとえ危機的な状況でも
明日を信じることができるよ
column2: Even in times of crisis, you can have faith in tomorrow!
speaker: Quintus

old:
この砦の強化案を考えているんだ
悪しき竜はいなくなってもオークどもは
相変わらずだからね
column2: I am considering a plan to strengthen this fortress. Even though the evil dragon is gone, the orcs are still here.
speaker: Quintus
